医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明运动可以抵消睡眠不足和缺氧的负面影响新研究探索了睡眠、氧气水平和锻炼如何影响我们执行脑力任务的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-suggests-exercise-can-counteract-the-negative-effects-of-sleep-deprivation-and-hypoxia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-suggests-exercise-can-counteract-the-negative-effects-of-sleep-deprivation-and-hypoxia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ada96cc-3d70-4610-835b-0efb43c0d9be Thu, 23 Nov 2023 11:13:28 -0500 Study suggests exercise can counteract the negative effects of sleep deprivation and hypoxia
自动化临床抑郁症诊断工具综述回顾如何利用面部、声学和语义特征的最新计算方法来预测重度抑郁症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/A-review-of-automated-clinical-depression-diagnosis-tools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/A-review-of-automated-clinical-depression-diagnosis-tools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=375e9d57-518a-46f1-87bf-2c0b1f16758b Thu, 23 Nov 2023 11:03:00 -0500 A review of automated clinical depression diagnosis tools
开启更健康的未来：通过持续采用更健康的饮食来估计预期寿命的增长持续转向更健康的饮食可以提高预期寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Unlocking-healthier-futures-Estimating-life-expectancy-gains-through-sutain-adoption-of-healthier-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Unlocking-healthier-futures-Estimating-life-expectancy-gains-through-sutain-adoption-of-healthier-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd158198-a1cc-4bd9-b36b-4c7ce33e73aa Thu, 23 Nov 2023 10:55:00 -0500 Unlocking healthier futures: Estimating life expectancy gains through sustained adoption of healthier diets
赋予家庭权力：创新的实践活动增强了时令蔬菜准备方面的知识、偏好和技能研究人员讨论了名为“四季健康烹饪”的实践项目的开发、实施和结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Empowering-families-Innovative-hands-on-initiative-enhances-knowledge-preferences-and-skills-in-seasonal-vegetable-preparation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Empowering-families-Innovative-hands-on-initiative-enhances-knowledge-preferences-and-skills-in-seasonal-vegetable-preparation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59de5c25-3f50-4b0a-b025-9f5829496f76 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 10:38:00 -0500 Empowering families: Innovative hands-on initiative enhances knowledge, preferences, and skills in seasonal vegetable preparation
了解婴儿的思维：对婴儿期空间意识的新见解研究人员研究了人类婴儿的动态视觉体感皮质相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Understanding-babys-mind-New-insights-into-spatial-awareness-in-infancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Understanding-babys-mind-New-insights-into-spatial-awareness-in-infancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b6f4432-731d-4c8f-981d-55d46583f061 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 10:33:00 -0500 Understanding baby's mind: New insights into spatial awareness in infancy
研究表明非处方药销售数据有助于预测呼吸道疾病死亡人数研究人员利用基于人工智能 (AI) 的预测工具，研究了整合非处方药（例如止咳糖浆）的销售对于改善英国呼吸系统疾病死亡预测的价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-suggests-non-prescription-sales-data-can-help-to-forecast-respiratory-disease-fatalities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-suggests-non-prescription-sales-data-can-help-to-forecast-respiratory-disease-fatalities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02948edb-2042-4a01-a715-00f5dca3b6ad Thu, 23 Nov 2023 10:01:00 -0500 Study suggests non-prescription sales data can help to forecast respiratory disease fatalities
CN Bio 凭借与 FDA 的持续研究，在 2023 年 OBN 奖中荣获“年度最具影响力行业合作”奖CN Bio 荣获 2023 年 OBN 奖“年度最具影响力行业合作”奖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/CN-Bio-wins-e28098Most-Impactful-Industry-Collaboration-of-the-Yeare28099-at-the-OBN-Awards-2023-for-ongoing- FDA 研究.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/CN-Bio-wins-e28098Most-Impactful-Industry-Collaboration-of-the-Yeare28099-at-the-OBN-Awards-2023-for-ongoing-研究与 FDA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7e511de-1da5-4c86-a204-1c91e505be22 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 09:28:00 -0500 CN Bio wins ‘Most Impactful Industry Collaboration of the Year’ at the OBN Awards 2023 for ongoing research with the FDA
AmoyDx 与 CST 扩大现有合作伙伴关系，共同开发伴随诊断 (CDx) 以支持精准肿瘤学Cell Signaling Technology (CST) 是一家生命科学生物技术公司和领先的抗体、试剂盒和服务提供商，以及淘大诊断股份有限公司 (AmoyDx) 是一家中国精准肿瘤学领域的创新分子诊断公司，今天宣布扩大双方在中国伴随诊断 (CDx) 开发的持续合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/AmoyDx-and-CST-Expand-Existing-Partnership-for-the-Development-of-Companion-Diagnostics-(CDx)-to-Support-Precision-肿瘤学.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/AmoyDx-and-CST-Expand-Existing-Partnership-for-the-Development-of-Companion-Diagnostics-(CDx)-to-Support-Precision- Oncology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4a6729c-03b4-43c0-aac2-e0ace4da8e7b Thu, 23 Nov 2023 09:22:00 -0500 AmoyDx and CST Expand Existing Partnership for the Development of Companion Diagnostics (CDx) to Support Precision Oncology
赋能肿瘤学研究：跨膜蛋白和尖端生产平台在本次采访中，朱方一博士向 NewsMed 讲述了跨膜蛋白在靶向肿瘤学研究中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Empowering-oncology-research-Transmembrane- Proteins-and-cutting-edge-product-platforms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Empowering-oncology-research-Transmembrane- Proteins-and-cutting-edge-product-platforms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d789cd0d-3099-4e9b-b1ff-dc4483fbdf92 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 09:21:00 -0500 Empowering oncology research: Transmembrane proteins and cutting-edge production platforms
Integra 推出采用 Sureflo™ 技术的无菌聚丙烯试剂储存器INTEGRA Biosciences 扩展了其试剂储存器产品组合，包括采用 SureFlo™ 防密封技术的 10 毫升和 25 毫升无菌聚丙烯储存器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Integra-Launches-Sterile-聚丙烯-Reagent-Reservoirs-With-Surefloe284a2-Technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Integra-Launches-Sterile-聚丙烯-Reagent-Reservoirs-With-Surefloe284a2-Technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a80fcec-8591-4ada-b66c-6e6f0c9ed5ed Thu, 23 Nov 2023 09:19:00 -0500 Integra Launches Sterile Polypropylene Reagent Reservoirs With Sureflo™ Technology
